meanings.sent1: The fumigants cleared out all the pests from the warehouse.
meanings.sent2: The exterminator brought in fumigants to get rid of the bugs.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat accidentally released the fumigants, causing chaos in the house.
meanings.sent4: The fumigants worked like magic, making the room pest-free in no time.
meanings.sent5: The strong smell of the fumigants lingered in the air long after the treatment.

meanings.sent1: The powerful fumigants quickly spread throughout the room.
meanings.sent2: The company specialized in manufacturing effective fumigants for pest control.
meanings.sent3: The fumigants, like tiny warriors, fought off the invading insects.
meanings.sent4: The fumigants acted as invisible shields, protecting the crops from harm.
meanings.sent5: The fumigants swirled around, creating a barrier against the pests.

meanings.definition: Chemicals that are used to fumigate.
meanings.sent1: The fumigants were carefully applied to ensure complete pest eradication.
meanings.sent2: Farmers rely on fumigants to protect their harvest from harmful insects.
meanings.sent3: The fumigants danced in the air, chasing away the unwanted guests.
meanings.sent4: The fumigants seeped into every corner, eliminating any hidden pests.
meanings.sent5: The fumigants worked silently but effectively, leaving no trace of the bugs.
